column4: I am going crazy here,  just installed Ubuntu here, and setup a tftpd server with inetd. now, for some reason I can only connect locally, but not from other machine - what could I have done wrong?
no, this is directly with a switch to the ubuntu machine
when I tcpdump on the interface of ubuntu machine, it says "ICMP 10.4.1.171 udp port 1037 unreachable"
no, this is directly with a switch to the ubuntu machine
